job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Proto AI is actively seeking Software Engineers to join its growing Engineering department to work on its growing software development needs. Proto AI provides enterprise-scale AI solutions through software-as-a-service applications in several verticals.</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Effectively design, develop, and operate software systems at scale</li><li>Assist in the design &amp; architecture for new products</li><li>Ability to convert applied mathematics to computational engineering</li><li>Excellent written and oral communication skills</li><li>Develop and maintain unit and integration tests</li><li>Working with Microsoft Azure to deploy highly available, scalable, and secure applications</li><li>Work efficiently and meet project deadlines with limited supervision</li><li>Participate as a team member in sprint demonstrations and presentations to product stakeholders</li><li>Strong attention to detail, critical thinking skills, and solid troubleshooting ability</li><li>Create the functional design &amp; architecture for new products &amp; features</li><li>Maintain control of source, research and trade secrets</li><li>Convert applied mathematics to computational engineering</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications:</strong> </p><p><br></p><ul><li>Self-starter who needs minimal supervision, is curious about software, and comes with a team-first approach to the position</li><li>Enjoys a start-up atmosphere and is flexible, shows good judgement, takes initiative, and is willing to take on a variety of tasks and responsibilities as needed to achieve goals</li><li>A 4-yr college degree in Computer Science or a related field</li><li>At least 5 years software development experience, preferably with C# and C++</li><li>3 years of experience building web, microservice solutions in Windows/Linux environments</li><li>2+ years of experience building and deploying scalable, and secure enterprise solutions with Azure or AWS</li><li>Understanding of Microservices design, development, and deployment on Azure Service Fabric</li><li>Experience with DevOps practices for CI/CD, release management, and automation using Azure DevOps</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Pluses:</strong></p><ul><li>Familiarity with developing software to support parallel computing</li><li>Familiarity with Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, and Durability (ACID) rules</li><li>Understanding of inter-process communication to include custom marshaling and threading scenarios</li></ul>
